name: Astral_Form
display_help: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. While Invisible, your movement is Slowed. Very low Endurance cost.

name: Lightning_Clap
display_help: You can clap your hands together to release a violent Lightning Clap. The Lightning Clap can knock down most nearby foes, Disorienting many of them. Lightning Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Lightning_Field
display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Lightning Field.

name: Scream

name: Dreadful_Wail
display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, -Resist, Self -Recovery

name: Lightning_Storm
display_help: The cabal sorceress can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches her. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

name: Healing_Aura
display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

name: Clear_Mind
display_help: Frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, grants target clearer Perception to see hidden foes. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception
display_target_help: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

name: Adrenalin_Boost
display_help: Dramatically increases an ally's Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate for 90 seconds. Also grants the target high resistance to slow effects. Recharge: Very Long
display_target_help: The Adrenalin Boost has stimulated your system. Your Endurance recovery, Healing rate and Attack speeds are all increased and you are resistant to slow effects.
display_attacker_hit: You empower {PlayerDest} with almost limitless Endurance, but are now Disoriented.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with almost limitless Endurance.
